name: News 365
description:
Maded for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2 (theme: REWIND)

In News 365, you work on a newspaper publishing company and it's coming the end of the year. You need to pick the news that ocurred in the last 365 days to select which one's will feature the year's rewind.

Be careful tough, there are some distractions in the middle of the newspapers.

Miss 3 news/distractions and you loose your job.

Controls:

Mouse => drag and drop the papers on the demarked places.
